String.string: Ask {@creature:247#2003$$Cheniel} what you need to do at {@Rgn:47007$$Blightroar Research Station}.
Kill the {@creature:47#2003#argonomorph gulas} that threaten {@creature:47#7005#faerie saplings} west of the {@Rgn:47003$$Bridgehead}.
Meet {@creature:247#2010$$Yasring} at {@Rgn:47007$$Blightroar Research Station} and tell her you're here to help.
Persuade {@creature:247#1004$$Rozaline} in {@Rgn:47007$$Blightroar Research Station} that the Argon Bases need purifying as well.
Kill {@creature:47#3001$$Contaminated Wendigo} and {@creature:47#3002$$Argononomorph Wendigo} near the {@Rgn:47012$$Argon Shield Emitter}.
Kill {@creature:47#3003$$Argonomorph Wendigo Shaman} at {@Rgn:47012$$Argon Shield Emitter} and collect shield emitter fragments.
Return to the {@Rgn:47007$$Blightroar Research Station} and deliver Strange Wendigo's Hide to {@creature:247#2010$$Yasring}.
{@creature:247#2010$$Yasring} looks like she made a decision. Talk to Yasring.
Ask {@linkcreature:247#1004$$Rozaline} at {@Rgn:47007$$Blightroar Research Station} news of southern Arun.
